title: Shrimp Scampi
description: Shrimp Scampi - ATK's #1 most popular recipe
steps: Peel shrimp, reserve shells. Brine shrimp in salt, sugar, 1 quart water for 15 minutes.
Cook shells in 1 tbsp oil until spotty brown. Add wine and thyme, simmer 5 minutes. Strain, reserve liquid.
Cook garlic and pepper flakes in oil over medium-low until golden, 3-5 minutes.
Add wine mixture, simmer. Add shrimp, cover, cook 5-7 minutes.
Transfer shrimp. Add lemon-cornstarch mixture, cook until thickened.
Off heat, whisk in butter and parsley. Return shrimp, toss.
notes: Making stock from shells adds depth.
Poaching in wine cooks shrimp more evenly.
source: America's Test Kitchen (ATK's #1 most popular recipe)
